name: Soko-ban Select 30
overview: Soko-ban Select 30 is a top-down puzzle game with 30 stages. Like the other Sōkoban games, the objective is to push all crates onto designated spots. One visual difference from the other titles is that in this game the crates have real life brands on them. The game was included on extra disk with purchase of KAO blank floppy disk pack.
